captions.text:
Wearing the clothes I bought for you
Wearing the perfume I gave you
You’re probably smiling looking at her

Was it that good, 
good enough to leave me?
How could I have done better?

I want to forget about you 
but we spent too much time together

The times that have passed by 
seems unfair and tears are falling

I’ll show you a completely different me 
I’ll show you a prettier me

I’m not going to cry for love or 
cry for you like I'm stupid

I’ll meet a better man and show you,
that I'm happier than you

I’m fine without you
I won’t give up, boy you gotta be aware
I changed my hairstyle, put make-up on

High heels and short skirt, 
everyone is looking at me
If I ever see you on the street

I will smile and walk 
away from you

I’ll show you a completely different me 
I’ll show you a prettier me

I’m not going to cry for love or 
cry for you like I'm stupid

I’ll meet a better man and show you,
that I'm happier than you

I’m fine without you, 
I won’t give up,boy you gotta be aware
I’ll throw away the ring you gave me
get rid of the letters you wrote

I’ll forget you without regret 
I will forget you, erase you

I’ll show you a completely different me 
I’ll show you a prettier me

I’m not going to cry for love or 
cry for you like I'm stupid

I’ll meet a better man and show you,
that I'm happier than you

I’m fine without you, 
I won’t give up,boy you gotta be aware
